item.title: Ethereum Only Needs to Rise 1% More to Hit an All-Time High
item.description: On August 23rd, with the continuous rise of the crypto market, Ethereum only needs to increase by another 1% to break through the all-time high set in November 2021 ($4868).

item.title: 「ETH Ecosystem」 Altcoins See Broad Gains, ETHFI Surges Over 22% in 24 Hours
item.description: On August 23rd, according to HTX market data, the "ETH Ecosystem" altcoins witnessed a collective rise. These include:ETHFI surged by more than 22% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $1.295;ETC surged by more than 20% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $25.00;ENA surged by more than 19% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $0.7365;SSV surged by more than 18% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $9.88;ARB surged by more than 18% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $0.5755;EIGEN surged by more than 16% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $1.493;LDO surged by more than 15% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $1.464;ENS surged by more than 14% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $27.84.

item.title: Apple is exploring using Gemini AI to support the new version of Siri, with Claude and ChatGPT also under consideration.
item.description: August 23rd: According to market reports, Apple is looking into the utilization of Google's Gemini AI to provide support for the new version of Siri. However, it has not excluded the possibility of continuing to use its own Siri AI model. It is also giving consideration to Anthropic (Claude) and OpenAI (ChatGPT) for the new version of Siri. (Golden Finance)

item.title: If Ethereum breaks $5,000, the mainstream CEX cumulative short liquidation pressure will reach $544 million.
item.description: On August 23rd, based on Coinglass data, if Ethereum breaks through $5,000, the total short liquidation intensity on mainstream CEX will amount to 544 million.Conversely, if Ethereum drops below $4,500, the total long liquidation intensity on mainstream CEX will reach 2.512 billion.BlockBeats Notes: The liquidation chart does not disclose the exact number of contracts to be liquidated or the precise value of contracts to be liquidated. The bars on the liquidation chart actually represent the significance of each liquidation cluster in relation to adjacent liquidation clusters, that is, intensity.Therefore, the liquidation chart shows to what extent reaching a particular price level will be impacted. A higher "liquidation bar" indicates that the price reaching that level will trigger a more intense reaction due to a liquidity cascade.

item.title: Trump: The stock market just went up nearly 1000 points ten minutes ago
item.description: On August 23, President Trump of the United States tweeted that the stock market had witnessed a nearly 1000-point increase in the past 10 minutes.At the moment of the tweet, the three major U.S. stock indexes were on the rise. The Dow increased by more than 2%, the Nasdaq rose by 1.55%, and the S&P 500 went up by 1.56%.

item.title: LookOnChain: Ethereum Surges Past $4800
item.description: On August 23rd, based on HTX market data, Ethereum has gone beyond $4800, and the 24-hour price increase has expanded to 14.14%.

item.title: 21SHARES XRP ETF has been registered in Delaware
item.description: On August 23rd, according to market information, the 21SHARES XRP ETF has been officially registered in Delaware, the United States.

item.title: In the past 4 hours, there has been a total of $381 million in liquidations across the entire network, with the majority being from short positions.
item.description: August 23rd. Based on Coinglass data, within the past 4 hours, the entire network witnessed a liquidation of $381 million. There were $619.99 million in long liquidations and $3.19 billion in short liquidations.In the past 24 hours, a total of 148,025 people worldwide faced liquidation, with a total liquidation amount of $611 million. The largest single liquidation took place on OKX - ETH-USDT-SWAP, amounting to $10.0029 million.

item.title: Ethereum Surges Above $4,700, a certain short-selling whale adds $5.22 million to collateral, now facing a $14 million unrealized loss
item.description: On August 23rd, as monitored by Onchain Lens, with Ethereum surging above $4700, a 20x short whale deposited 5.22 million USDC into Hyperliquid in order to avoid liquidation.At present, their unrealized loss amounts to $14 million, and the overall loss is $26 million.

item.title: Analysis: Powell has clearly stated that the Fed's primary goal has shifted to supporting the labor market, and interest rate decisions will be guided by employment data
item.description: On August 23rd, based on The Kobeissi Letter's analysis, the significance of Fed Chair Powell's speech today is as follows: "Today's speech shows that their (the Fed's) primary attention has now turned to propping up the labor market. A change in the risk balance may necessitate policy adjustments, and he specifically mentioned the labor market."Consequently, the employment report will decide future rate cuts.
